original_title: Mil nubes de paz cercan el cielo, amor, jamás acabarás de ser amor
overview: Gerardo, a 17-year old guy has just finished his relationship with Bruno and starts wandering hopeless through the streets of the city. In his wandering he's tortured by images: each masculine body he sees reminds him of his lover. Gerardo is determined to keep what's left of his dying love. The only comfort he has is a letter that Bruno left him with his boss.
title: A Thousand Clouds of Peace Fence the Sky, Love; Your Being Love Will Never End
